title: Your Favorite Restaurant Might Be Taking Delivery Off the Menu
sub_head: Applebeeâ€™s, Olive Garden, IHOP are among eateries shutting off online orders for stretches
body:
Consumers might no longer be able to count on delivery of pancakes, ice cream or whatever else they crave, whenever they crave it.
Some restaurants, struggling with labor shortages and the return of customers to on-site dining, are choosing to scale back at times on often less-profitable delivery and to-go orders, companies and restaurateurs said.
